sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.song-list
   .songs(v-for="(song, id) in currentPlaylist")
    .videoId(:class="{yuh: currentSong.videoId === song.videoId}") videoId: {{ song.videoId }}
    .name name: {{ song.name }}
    v-divider(v-if="id !== 0")
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { usePlaylistStore } from '../store/playlist'
import { VDivider } from 'vuetify/components'
export default {
  components: {
    VDivider
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentPlaylist', 'currentSong']),
  },
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.song-list {
  .songs {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: green;
    .videoId {
      &.yuh{
        color: blue;
      }
    }
}
}
</style>
